comment: According to the Left, it's "bad" to want to see your own people live in peace and to prosper. Well, say hello to the Bad Guy.
amr:
# ::snt According to the Left, it's "bad" to want to see your own people live in peace and to prosper. Well, say hello to the Bad Guy.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG0 (l / left-19)
            :ARG1 (b / bad-07
                  :ARG1 (w / want-01
                        :ARG0 (y / you)
                        :ARG1 (s2 / see-01
                              :ARG0 y
                              :ARG1 (a / and
                                    :op1 (l2 / live-01
                                          :ARG0 (p / person
                                                :poss y)
                                          :manner (p2 / peace))
                                    :op2 (p3 / prosper-01
                                          :ARG0 y))))))
      :snt2 s
      :mode imperative
      :ARG0 y
      :ARG1 (h / hello)
      :ARG2 (g / guy
            :ARG1-of (b2 / bad-07))
      :mod (w2 / well))

# ::snt Speak for yourself.
(s / speak-01
      :mode imperative
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :mod (b / by-oneself))
